author: The Critical Drinker
description: Reshoots, delays, budget overspends, changing scripts and disastrous test screenings. Captain America: Brave New World has it all, and much more. With an estimated budget of $400 Million and even more reshoots on the way, this film is shaping up to be one of the biggest disasters since The Marvels.
title: Captain America 4: A Brave New Disaster
